channel.title: CDS Global
channel.description: CDS Global is a customer-centric, technology-driven, global company that delivers effective solutions for our strategic partners across multiple industries.
channel.copyright: 2013 CDS Global, Inc. All rights reserved.

item.title: Customer Touchpoints: More than Just Service-level Agreements
item.description: While our numbers might impress, customer service clients share why they brought their businesses to CDS Global – including our unparalleled experience, expertise, revenue opportunities and world-class customer care.

item.title: Message from Malcolm
item.description: Everything in this era is changing, but keeping the customer as the only thing that matters is a constant that will always drive success. Watch Chairman and CEO Malcolm Netburn’s video as he explains that despite the importance of brand-building, companies must maintain a laser focus on the customers who enable them to produce great products.

item.title: Ensuring Excellent Customer Service: Q-and-A with Highlights’ Jeff Cundiff and Meredith’s Renee Gilley-Gates
item.description: Renee and Jeff share their customer service philosophies, insights and how CDS Global keeps their businesses moving forward.

item.title: Expert Perspectives with Angie Nash, Senior Manager of Customer Service for CDS Global’s Boone Facility
item.description: Get an insider’s view on the spike in tablet and digital customer service and trends in up-selling, autorenewals, subscription models and more.

item.title: The Formula for Success in the Digital Era [INFOGRAPHIC]
item.description: A visual depiction of results from the Monetizing the Digital Revolution, 3rd Edition industry benchmarking report with sound advice on how publishers can ensure digital success.

item.title: Postal Service to Continue Saturday Delivery
item.description: The Postal Service recently announced that it has delayed implementation of a proposed delivery schedule that would eliminate residential mail delivery on Saturdays, and rate increases may be on the horizon.

item.title: Strategies for Success in the Digital Subscription Marketplace
item.description: Today’s consumers are now not only expecting, but demanding, digital subscription-based services. Download our free white paper for an overview of changes in subscription models and consumer behavior, as well as concrete advice on how to adapt to this changing environment.
